There are many ingredients that you can include in a hair mask for color-treated hair. Here are a few to consider:

1. Avocado - Rich in vitamins and fatty acids that can help nourish and strengthen hair. 2. Coconut oil - Conditions and moisturizes hair, reducing breakage and improving shine. 3. Aloe vera - Soothes and moisturizes the scalp, promoting healthy hair growth. 4. Argan oil - A lightweight oil that nourishes and protects hair from the damaging effects of styling and coloring. 5. Yogurt - Contains lactic acid, which can help exfoliate the scalp and promote healthy hair growth. 6. Banana - Rich in potassium and vitamins, bananas can help nourish and strengthen hair. 7. Apple cider vinegar - Can help remove buildup on the scalp and restore the natural pH balance of hair. These are just a few of the many ingredients you can use in a homemade hair mask for color-treated hair. Be creative and experiment with different ingredients to find the combination that works best for you.
